ovdesc.p: Foreign Exchange deals can be done through a series of different ways. They can be done through the intermediary of brokers, in which case the brokers need to be specified on the Broker table or through other means such as Reuters, Telex, Telephone etc. This table allows the user to define which are the accepted deal methods within his environment.

desc.p: Contains the description of the deal method and will be used to enhance the two character code entered by the operator (e.g. TX might stand for Telex).
34 characters. Multivalue field to allow several different language translations.
Contains the keys of the various Deal Methods allowed within the bank.
RE: for Reuter TL: for Telex PM: for Telephone etc.
